articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Europe is the fastest-warming continent, report says - NBC News
articles.description: Europe is the fastest-warming continent and its temperatures are rising at roughly twice the global average, two top climate monitoring organizations reported.
articles.content: Europe is the fastest-warming continent and its temperatures are rising at roughly twice the global average, two top climate monitoring organizations reported Monday, warning of the consequences for … [+3099 chars]

articles.title: European astronaut rookies make the grade - BBC.com
articles.description: The European Space Agency's latest intake of astronauts complete their basic training.
